data.comment: It is reported that 4000 spectators are in attendance today.
The first-half is in progress. Khimki get the game underway.
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Arena Khimki.
CSKA Moscow's Kirill Nababkin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
In the minute 8, Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Khimki.
CSKA Moscow's Alan Dzagoev gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 10, Khimki to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Khimki's Vladimir Dyadyun attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Khimki throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in the half of Khimki.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
Free kick for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
Mario Fernandes for CSKA Moscow is whistled offside.
In the minute 17, Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
CSKA Moscow take a 0-1 lead thanks to Konstantin Kuchaev.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 21, Kirill Bozhenov gets his shot on target but fails to score for Khimki.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 23, Khimki to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Khimki.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 26, CSKA Moscow drive upfield and Fedor Chalov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Khimki defender.
CSKA Moscow drives forward and Ivan Oblyakov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ball safe as CSKA Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
In the minute 31, CSKA Moscow are pushing forward but Alan Dzagoev's finish is wide of the goal.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Khimki a goal kick.
Konstantin Kuchaev for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 32, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Khimki throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
Khimki are coming forward and Arshak Koryan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a CSKA Moscow goal kick.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
In the minute 35, Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
Vladimir Dyadyun's header is off-target for Khimki.
In the minute 36, CSKA Moscow have a goal kick.
Khimki to take a throw-in in CSKA Moscow territory.
Free kick Khimki.
In the minute 39, Khimki pushes forward through Artem Polyarus, whose finish on goal is saved.
CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 44, Alan Dzagoev of CSKA Moscow is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
It's now 0-2 in Khimki as Alan Dzagoev scores for CSKA Moscow.
Konstantin Kuchaev instrumental with a fine assist.
The second-half has commenced. CSKA Moscow with the kick-off.
Dmitri Gunko (Khimki) is making a first substitution, with Kamran Aliev replacing Arshak Koryan.
In the minute 48, Mario Fernandes of CSKA Moscow smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
CSKA Moscow awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Khimki.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Igor Diveev (CSKA Moscow) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
In the minute 51, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vladislav Bezborodov blows against CSKA Moscow's Fedor Chalov for offside.
Vladislav Bezborodov waits before resuming play because Alan Dzagoev for CSKA Moscow is still down.
In the minute 55, Vladimir Dyadyun (Khimki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Alan Dzagoev, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Arnor Sigurdsson is the substitute for CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 56, Khimki's Ilya Kukharchuk is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Khimki throw-in in CSKA Moscow's half.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow close to the penalty box.
In the minute 61, Ivan Oblyakov (CSKA Moscow) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 64, Viktor Goncharenko is making the team's second substitution at Arena Khimki with Nayair Tiknizyan replacing Fedor Chalov.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in CSKA Moscow.
In the minute 67, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mohamed Konate is replacing Ilya Kukharchuk for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 68, Arnor Sigurdsson of CSKA Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, CSKA Moscow have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 72, Khimki are pushing forward but Kamran Aliev's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at Arena Khimki.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 74, CSKA Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Georgi Schennikov of CSKA Moscow gets in a strike, but is off target.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 78, CSKA Moscow drive forward but Konstantin Kuchaev is judged offside.
Aleksandr Troshechkin (Khimki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Khimki's Mohamed Konate has run offside.
In the minute 83, The away team have replaced Konstantin Kuchaev with Jaka Bijol. This is the third substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
Adolfo Gaich is replacing Ivan Oblyakov for CSKA Moscow at Arena Khimki.
The away team have replaced Konstantin Maradishvili with Kristijan Bistrovic. This is the fifth substitution made today by Viktor Goncharenko.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Mohamed Konate (Khimki) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
In the minute 87, Khimki's Artem Polyarus is on target but unsuccessful.
In Khimki Khimki's Kamran Aliev is caught offside.
Khimki drive into the zone and Vladimir Dyadyun is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick CSKA Moscow.
Throw-in for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Adolfo Gaich hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for CSKA Moscow.
Artem Polyarus (Khimki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vladimir Dyadyun's header is off-target for Khimki.
Goal kick for CSKA Moscow at Arena Khimki.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
